tasks.task: Create a type selector to target all paragraphs.
Create a type selector to target all headings.
Create an ID selector to target the element with an ID of "sidebar."
Create a class selector to target all elements with a class of "resources."
Create a class selector to target all list items with a class of "special."
Create a class selector to target the list item with a class of "special" and "call_to_action".
Create a child selector to target list items with a class of "special" whose parents are unordered lists.
Create a descendant selector to target all unordered lists of the footer.
Create a child selector to target the div with a class of "left" and the div with a class of "right".
Create an adjacent sibling selector to target the first line of the first paragraph following heading 1 elements.
Create a selector for the hover state of list items for an unordered list with a class of "resources" that's a child of a div with a class of "middle".
Create a space selector to target a list item with a class of "call_to_action".
